p:
Elicitation is provoking such behavior of plants by induction of chemical defense as stress response; various types of physiological and molecular factors exist as elicitors
20 . They are basically classified into two groups as Biotic and Abiotic
2 . Elicitation is one among most widely used and cost effective approach for induction and to maximize the productivity of secondary metabolites by reducing time period as well as high yield in low volume of cultures
21, 22 . However, the type, dose level and specificity of an elicitor along cultural conditions possess significant role in influencing elicitation
23 .
